features.name: Two Single Beds.
features.description: Two single beds (90cm x 200cm) for a comfortable stay.

features.name: Convertible Couch.
features.description: Full-length gray sofa that can be converted into a single bed.

features.name: Spacious Ensuite Bathroom.
features.description: Large bathroom featuring a full-size bathtub under a skylight, vanity sink, and shower.

features.name: Smart Entertainment & Security.
features.description: Includes a portable waterproof Sonos speaker, charging station with cables, and a security box.

features.name: Storage & Climate Control.
features.description: Freestanding wardrobe, dresser drawers, air conditioning, and a dehumidifier for maximum comfort.

features.name: Security Features.
features.description: Equipped with a security box for personal belongings.
